A defined list of websites is added to the `hosts` file of the OS with a redirect to `127.0.0.1`." description: "This is the core functionality of beproductive. A defined list of websites is added to the `hosts` file of the OS with a redirect to `127.0.0.1`." nb_path: "00_blocker.ipynb" ---

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Blocker[source]

Blocker(redirect='127.0.0.1')

The core of the package. It modifies the hosts file of the OS.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Blocker.block[source]

Blocker.block()

Blocks all specified websites by replacing hosts file with hosts.blocked

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Blocker.unblock[source]

Blocker.unblock()

Unblocks all websites by restoring the original hosts file

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Blocker.notify[source]

Blocker.notify(message, title='Website Blocker')

Sends notification to CLI and - if available - to GUI

{% endraw %}

Using Blocker

{% raw %} 
blocker = Blocker()
blocker.block()

hosts.blocked created
Hosts file replaced with hosts.blocked

True
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
blocker.unblock()

Hosts file replaced with hosts.original

True
{% endraw %}

Command line tool

{% raw %} 
hosts.blocked created
Run blocker.py with arguments BLOCK or UNBLOCK
{% endraw %}
